channel.title: Causality on The Mouse Imaging Centre Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Causality on The Mouse Imaging Centre Blog

item.title: An overfit representation of ICLR 2018
item.description: I was recently extremely fortunate to attend ICLR 2018, albeit as something of an interloper. Accordingly, what follows is surely a rather atypical highlight reel. All pedantry and any inaccuracy is, of course, due to my own limited understanding of these elegant topics and the breadth of their application. Causal reasoning and graphical models There is a well-developed modern theory of causal inference and reasoning based on graphical models developed by Judea Pearl and others.
